description: This file defines a React functional component called NoteEditor, which provides a user interface for editing notes, including saving, cancelling, and deleting actions.

methods.name: NoteEditor
methods.description: React component for editing a note, managing local state, and handling user interactions such as save, cancel, and delete.

methods.name: handleChange
methods.description: Updates component state when user modifies input fields.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission to save the note.
